description: This traybake is an easy way to enjoy a delicious, restaurant quality dish at home. Serve with potatoes or crusty bread on the side.
name: Chicken, Grape & Walnut Traybake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 190°C/170°C fan-forced. Arrange the onions, fennel, garlic cloves and grapes in the a large roasting tin. Drizzle over the oil, mix well and season with black pepper.

Top the vegetables with the chicken breasts and pour the wine into the roasting tray. Roast for 30 minutes, remove from the oven and add the walnuts. Roast for 25 minutes more, until the chicken is golden and cooked through.
Whisk together the extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, mustard and tarragon and season with cracked black pepper.
Serve the chicken with the vegetables and grapes and dressing spooned over the top.
